name: Simple InterceptMissile&TurretBehaviour Demo
description:
All models are included as part of the demo

This asset : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/simple-interceptmissile-turr...

or

https://shakiroslan.itch.io/unity-asset-simple-intercept-missile-turret-behaviou...

Full model asset

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/polygon-war-pack-... 

Unity simple intercept missile & turret behaviour asset pack that contains scripts for intercept guided missile, its launcher and automatic turret that lead the target and radar for enemies detection. Support pooling management for projectile.
